Hi! I'm Molly and I'm a front-end developer based in Charlotte, NC.

I am seeking a team where I can bring my passions for accessible web design and creativity to web development.
When I’m not working, pursuing side projects or getting lost in the art of web development, I can be found running, hiking, traveling, and leaving dishes in the sink.

Projects.

Rogue Pickings

Rogue Pickings is a sample single-page website for a food business. This was originally a static website, which was then converted into a responsive design using Flexbox.

Unplugged

Unplugged is a multi-page responsive website that adapts to various mobile, tablet, and desktop screens.

Guess the Word Game

Players guess the word by entering one letter at a time. If the player guesses all the letters correctly before they use up their allotted guess, they 2 win!

GitHub Repo Gallery

The GitHub Repo Gallery pulls data from my GitHub profile to create a gallery of repos.

Sticky Note App

The Sticky Note App is an interactive app that lets users create, edit, and delete “sticky notes” on their computer to keep track of to-do items.
